Class SphereRequestDecorator<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sphere.sdk.models.Base
      • io.sphere.sdk.client.SphereRequestDecorator<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the result of this request
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    SphereRequest<T>

    public abstract class SphereRequestDecorator<T>
extends Base
implements SphereRequest<T>
    Public available base class to decorate the behaviour of SphereRequests.

    • Method Detail

      • canDeserialize

        public boolean canDeserialize(HttpResponse httpResponse)
        Description copied from interface: SphereRequest
        Checks if the response can be handled by SphereRequest.deserialize(HttpResponse). Use case 1: A http response returns 404 and the this SphereRequest can handle this error by returning an empty optional, an empty list or throwing a domain specific exception.
        Specified by:
        canDeserialize in interface SphereRequest<T>
        Parameters:
        httpResponse - the http response which shall be transformed
        Returns:
        true if the http response can be consumed, false otherwise

      • httpRequestIntent

        public HttpRequestIntent httpRequestIntent()
        Description copied from interface: SphereRequest
        Provides an http request intent, this does not include the execution of it.
        Specified by:
        httpRequestIntent in interface SphereRequest<T>
        Returns:
        http request intent

      • deserialize

        public T deserialize(HttpResponse httpResponse)
        Description copied from interface: SphereRequest
        Takes an http response and maps it into a Java object of type T. Before calling this method, check with SphereRequest.canDeserialize(HttpResponse) if the response can be consumed.
        Specified by:
        deserialize in interface SphereRequest<T>
        Parameters:
        httpResponse - the http response of SPHERE.IO
        Returns:
        the deserialized object
